alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 1:57AM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 12 inches. Greatest totals near the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon, Southern Big Horn, Powder River, and Southern Rosebud. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow could fall at the rate of one inch per hour.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
